name: Oaken Skin (Ex)
description: At 4th level, when entering a bloodrage, your skin thickens like bark and you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your natural armor. At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1.

set_value.description: At 4th level, when entering a bloodrage, your skin thickens like bark and you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your natural armor. At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1.
set_value.name: Oaken Skin (Ex)
